DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effectiveness R-SCP versus HUSLS treatment pelvic organ prolapse .
DOC.brief_title: SCP v HUSLS Pelvic Organ Prolapse Repair
DOC.detailed_description: To compare effectiveness Robotic Sacrocolpopexy versus vaginal High Uterosacral Ligament Suspension treatment pelvic organ prolapse . Both surgery standard care equally widely use throughout country well know safety efficacy .
DOC.criteria: 18 Years age older Signed Informed Consent Symptomatic pelvic organ prolapse , Willing able complete study visit NonHigh Uterosacral Ligament Suspension ( unable HUSLS time surgery ) , Dementia consider unable complete questionnaire 1 . Hx Alzheimer Disease 2 . Hx multiple stroke neurologic condition 3 . Caregiver state subject unable complete 4 . MDs opinion Inability complete follow visit due transportation issue 1 . No access transportation ( ie . vehicle ) 2 . Live > 2 hour LLUH 3 . Does financial mean Congenital anomaly 1 . Bladder Exstrophy 2 . Connective tissue disease 3 . Neovaginal prolapse 4 . Prolapse sex change vagina Chronic pelvic pain 1 . > 6 month pelvic pain undetermined origin 2. cyclic pain ( eg . period pain dysmenorrhea ) 3 . Patient comorbidities CPP 4 . Fibromyalgia 5 . Interstitial cystitis 6 . Vulvodynia Contraindications Mesh , 1 . Opposition use mesh ( ie . due religious belief ) 2 . History mesh complication past Pregnant planning become pregnant study period .
